trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St John
There were no other sightings in St John on or around August 8th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI believe it was a meteorite, I know that it is the season. However, I thoughtthat it was really close, and definitely burned up or skipped by. It seemed verylarge and was directly over Saint John for a few seconds, as it shot by, so Ihoped this information would help. I was on my back deck facing north East, stargazing.
Summary: Meteorite streaked accross the local sky!
